Services and Pricing

My rate for private tutoring and mentoring is £50 per hour. I offer discounts for block bookings paid in advance. Please enquire for more details.

I’m delighted to offer a one-off free half-hour consultation to all new clients, either in person or online, to discuss learning goals and get to know each other before committing to further sessions.

Please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or WhatsApp to arrange your first session!
